1100011001100011 0101010000110110 1 -> sum: 0001101010011010, cout: 1
0011001110100001 0000110010111100 1 -> sum: 0100000001011110, cout: 0
1001011110001001 0100000000111101 0 -> sum: 1101011111000110, cout: 0
0100111100001011 1100011110010001 0 -> sum: 0001011010011100, cout: 1
0011101011001111 0001011100111011 0 -> sum: 0101001000001010, cout: 0
1011001000010100 0111010111110111 0 -> sum: 0010100000001011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
